eu.clementime.rds
Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
  eu.clementime.rds.Inventory

public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object

Inventory manages items the doll has taken:
> normal view is open when the doll is touched, showing all inventory items,
> zoom view is open when clicking on an item,
> drag and drop is allowed in normal view to combine inventory item with screen item,
> and in zoom view to combine 2 items in inventory.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Clément

Constructor Detail

Inventory

public Inventory(DatabaseHandler dbh,
                 Context context,
                 org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                 org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Inventory sprites are loaded and created directly in the constructor.

Parameters:
dbh - database handler is stored for upcoming database calls
context - Android context, to retrieve files
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas
Method Detail

load

public void load(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                 org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, hides them which aren't used at start, register touch areas and set ZIndexes.

loadItems

public void loadItems(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                      org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, register touch areas and set ZIndexes. Dynamically set images on the BitmapTextureAtlas with posX & posY.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

display

public void display(float cameraMinX,
                    org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Inventory is displayed when player touches the doll.

Parameters:
cameraMinX - first item is displayed at camera min x
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

hide

public void hide()
Hides normal view inventory (= list of inventory items at screen bottom).

displayZoomView

public void displayZoomView(float xMin,
                            InventoryItem touchedItem,
                            org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Displays zoom when inventory is open and player clicks one item to see it better.

Parameters:
xMin - zoom is displayed depending on camera min x
touchedItem - item to zoom
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

displayZoomItem

public void displayZoomItem(float xMin,
                            InventoryItem touchedItem)
Displays item in zoom when zoom is open; set position of zoomed item, set small item colour lighter in normal view at screen bottom.

Parameters:
xMin - zoom is displayed depending on camera min x
touchedItem - item to zoom

hideZoomView

public void hideZoomView(InventoryItem touchedItem,
                         org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Hides zoom and zoom item when player clicks zoom frame; set item position out of screen for avoiding activation when player touches it (AndEngine allows touching invisible sprite).

Parameters:
touchedItem - zoomed item to hide and set to normal colour in normal view
scene - AndEngine scene, to unregister touch areas

drawInventory

public void drawInventory()
Draws boxes and items in normal view inventory.

redrawInventory

public void redrawInventory()
Redraw normal view inventory (=change position of all boxes & items) when an item is removed from the list.

addItem

public InventoryItem addItem(int itemId,
                             org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                             org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads image and create sprite of a new item after the doll took it, add it at then end of the inventory, attach it to the AndEngine scene, register touch area and set ZIndex. Dynamically set images on the BitmapTextureAtlas with posX & posY.

Parameters:
itemId - database item id
engine - AndEngine engine, to load texture
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprite to scene and register touch area

addItemAtEnd

public void addItemAtEnd(InventoryItem item)
Draws item at the end of normal view inventory.

Parameters:
item - item object to draw

hideItem

public void hideItem(InventoryItem item)
Hides big item after a combination of 2 other items.

Parameters:
item - item object to hide

removeItem

public void removeItem(int itemId)
Removes item if this one disappears after a combination (not mandatory).

Parameters:
itemId - inventory list item id

drawItem

public void drawItem(InventoryItem item,
                     float xBox,
                     float yBox)
Draws item in normal view, set its position, attach it to normal view, register physics handler on its big image for dragging.

Parameters:
item - item to draw
xBox - x of inventory box which contains this item
yBox - y of inventory box which contains this item

moveItemList

public void moveItemList(float xMin,
                         float x)
Item list movement managed by accelerometer, when player wants to see inventory items that do not fit in screen, if there are.

Parameters:
xMin - camera min x (scene/background x, not local x)
x - x generated by accelerometer movement
